description: This recipe is by Robert Farrar Capon and takes 2 hours 15 minutes, plus 24 hours' refrigerated marination. Tell us what you think of it at The New York Times - Dining - Food.
title: Lorna Laspia's Roast Wild Duck
title_page: Lorna Laspia's Roast Wild Duck Recipe - NYT Cooking
